intro.title: Financial Systems Framework
intro.overview: Hearts & Leaves: Economics of Right Relationship
intro.paragraph1: A comprehensive framework for transforming global financial systems from extraction-based economics to regenerative abundance through Hearts currency (care economy recognition) and Leaves tokens (ecological restoration rewards).
intro.paragraph2: This framework provides the economic foundation for civilization that serves rather than exploits the sacred interconnection of all life, guided by Indigenous wisdom and measured through love, meaning, and connection rather than accumulation and competition.
